channel.title: How would I add Christmas Crackers?
channel.description: Hey guys, i'm working on making some random events, and I want one to give you a random item, and one is a christmas cracker, (I have all that down so far) But how would I make it so if you use the christmas cracker on a PLAYER it would give you a random item, I know I would have to put like if the item is used on a player blah blah blah and additem.RandomCracker and stuff, But what would I use to make you able to use it on a player? Thanks in advance ;)

item.title: How would I add Christmas Crackers?
item.dc:creator: @xBl1tzScapex xBl1tzScapex
item.description:
@xBl1tzScapex wrote:

Hmm, will try I guess, thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: How would I add Christmas Crackers?

item.title: How would I add Christmas Crackers?
item.dc:creator: @lolvengeance lolvengeance
item.description:
@lolvengeance wrote:

download devolution v7 client.java and search party crackers id, on devolution you can use crackers on players and either you or the other player gets the phat.

Read full topic
item.source: How would I add Christmas Crackers?
